exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> exists x : lb, b ≂ a ⊕ x /\\ a ⪯ a ⊕ x" on hypothesis of type "a ≂ b ↓ c".
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment a, b, c, x, y : lb H1 : b ≂ a ⊕ x H2 : c ≂ a ⊕ y H3 : a ⪯ a ⊕ x H4 : a ⪯ a ⊕ y H5 : x ⪯ x ⊕ y H : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x -> a ⟂ y -> x ⟂ y -> (a ⊕ x) ↓ (a ⊕ y) ≂ a H0 : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x -> a ⟂ y -> x ⟂ y -> (a ⊕ x) ↓ (a ⊕ y) ⪯ a Unable to unify "(?M1584 ⊕ ?M1585) ↓ (?M1584 ⊕ ?M1586) ⪯ ?M1584" with "a ⪯ b ↓ c /\\ b ↓ c ⪯ a".

In environment a, b, c, x, y : lb H1 : b ≂ a ⊕ x H2 : c ≂ a ⊕ y z : lb H6 : a ⊕ x ≂ a ⊕ z H7 : a ⪯ a ⊕ z H4 : a ⪯ a ⊕ y H5 : x ⪯ x ⊕ y Unable to unify "?M1563 ⟂ ?M1565" with "a ⪯ b ↓ c /\\ b ↓ c ⪯ a".

In environment a, b, c, x, y : lb H1 : b ≂ a ⊕ x H2 : c ≂ a ⊕ y z : lb H6 : a ⊕ x ≂ a ⊕ z H7 : a ⪯ a ⊕ z t : lb H8 : a ⊕ y ≂ a ⊕ t H9 : a ⪯ a ⊕ t H5 : x ⪯ x ⊕ y Unable to unify "a ⊕ y ⟂ t" with "a ≂ b ↓ c".

original: intros. split. - intros H. apply lb_minus_plus in H. destruct H as [x [H1 H2]]. exists nil, x. split; try split; try split; try split; auto. - intros [x [y [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]. apply lb_ortho_plus_id; try auto. apply lb_minus_plus in H3. destruct H3 as [z [H6 H7]]. apply lb_ortho_anti with (b:=a⊕x) (y:=z); try auto. apply lb_minus_plus in H4. destruct H4 as [t [H8 H9]]. apply lb_ortho_anti with (a:=a⊕y) (x:=t); try auto.
